tycho-docks.name: Tycho City Docks
tycho-docks.description: Space dock on the outskirts of the Tycho City Geofront

cargo.description: Fabrications, finished textiles, potable water, produce and grain
Vehicles, heavy equipment, and equipment parts

tycho-geofront.name: Tycho Geofront
tycho-geofront.description: Tens of thousands live and work in the largest Lunar population center. Built into ancient lava tubes, the Geofront descends deep below the surface.

cargo.description: Bulk ice grain, out of service heavy equipment and vehicles

tycho-station.name: Tycho Station
tycho-station.description: The main orbital transfer station servicing the Tycho region.

cargo.description: Earth imports - vehicles and equipment, electronics, textiles, and sundries

refinery.name: Tycho Refinery
refinery.description: This large complex in the Tycho outer field processes Lunar ice into rocket fuel.

cargo.description: Fuel, vehicles, heavy equipment and parts.

mare-nubium.name: Mare Nubium
mare-nubium.description: Ilmenite mines dot the surrounding area of this metallurgical processing center.

cargo.description: Titanium and aluminum billets. Gadolinium, cerium, and other rare earths.

malapert.name: Malapert Array
malapert.description: This solar power station sits atop Malapert Mountain's eternal light peak.

mine.name: Ilmenite Mines
mine.description: A network of narrow shafts crisscrossing through the Lunar bedrock.

gateway.name: Gateway Fuel Depot
gateway.description: Once the main Lunar orbital station, now primarily a refuelling depot for intra solar travel.

elevator.name: Elevator Site
elevator.description: Construction site of the future Lunar elevator. When completed, this elevator will allow efficient travel between the Lunar south pole and L1.
